workflow.name: sap-ci
workflow.longdesc:
Configure a SAP Central Instance including:
1) virtual IP addresses for the SAP ASCS instance 2) a fileystems on shared storage /usr/sap/SID/DVEBMGS##, 3) SAPinstance for the Central Instance.

parameters.stepdesc: The ID specified here is for the SAP Central Instance resource group.

parameter.name: id
parameter.longdesc: Unique ID for the SAP Central Instance resource group in the cluster.

template.name: sap-sapinst-ci
template.stepdesc: This is the SAP Central instance.

template.name: sap-virtual-ip-ci
template.stepdesc: The IP address configured here will be for the SAP Central Instance.

template.name: sap-filesystem-sapci
template.stepdesc:
This filesystem is for the /usr/sap/SID/DVEBMGS## directory.
If a filesystem does not already exist on the block device specified here, you will need to run mkfs to create it, prior to starting the filesystem resource. You will also need to create the mountpoint directory on all cluster nodes.

override.name: operations
override.value: op stop timeout=300 op monitor interval=30 timeout=130
